nodes.text: Allegiance 4 is the fourth and final issue of the canon comic book miniseries Star Wars: Allegiance. It was written by Ethan Sacks, illustrated by Luke Ross, and published on October 30, 2019 by Marvel Comics. The issue features the story "A Rising Tide," in which the Resistance establishes an alliance with Aftab Ackbar's Mon Calamari forces.

BEFORE THE EXCITING EVENTS OF STAR WARS: THE RISE OF SKYWALKER! POE DAMERON and FINN have their own mission: to hunt down a weapons cache on the remote moon of Avedot, unaware that they are being hunted by the most notorious criminal gang in the galaxy.
Allegiance 4 leads in to the events of Sacks's previous Star Wars series, Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, with the Kendoh Gang pursuing the Sword of Khashyun.
